statements.st: SELECT txt_id, txt_title, txt_author, txt_text, txt_text_classified, txt_keywords_mac, txt_keywords_textrank FROM text;
INSERT INTO text(txt_title, txt_author, txt_text, txt_text_classified, txt_keywords_mac) VALUES (#{txtTitle}, #{txtAuthor}, #{txtText}, #{txtTextClassified}, #{txtKeywordsMac});
UPDATE text SET txt_text_classified = TRUE WHERE txt_id = #{txtId};
INSERT INTO word_tag(wtg_txt_id, wtg_value, wtg_tag) VALUES (#{textId}, #{value}, #{tag});
